sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function Terms() { return (

Terms & Conditions

Last Updated: August 12, 2025

Acceptance of Terms

These Terms and Conditions govern your use of BEAM, a B2B marketplace operated by us. By registering, posting projects, offering services, or engaging with other users, you (“Client” or “Service Provider”) agree to comply with these Terms and all applicable policies. The Platform is intended solely for lawful and professional business collaborations. You are solely responsible for the accuracy of your information, the timely and satisfactory completion of confirmed engagements, and adherence to all contractual and legal obligations. The Company is not liable for disputes, non-performance, or non-payment between users, though we may, at our discretion, provide mediation support. Any fraudulent, misleading, or harmful activity will result in immediate account termination and potential legal action. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must refrain from accessing or using the Platform.

Acceptance of Terms

By creating an account or using BEAM’s services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you are acting on behalf of a company or organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that entity to this Agreement.

Eligibility

Only registered businesses or their authorized representatives may create an account. The account holder must be at least 18 years of age and legally authorized to enter into binding agreements on behalf of the organization

User Accounts & Verification

During registration, you must provide accurate, current, and complete information, and promptly update it as necessary to ensure its accuracy. You are solely responsible for safeguarding your account credentials and maintaining the confidentiality of your login details. All activities conducted through your account will be deemed to have been carried out by you or with your authorization, and you accept full responsibility for any such actions.

Posting Projects

Clients must provide clear, accurate, and lawful project descriptions, timelines, and budgets, while Service Providers must ensure that their profiles, proposals, and communications are truthful, professional, and compliant with applicable laws and Platform policies. BEAM reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to review, edit, or remove any content, projects, proposals, or profiles that are misleading, violate third-party rights, or breach the Platform’s guidelines.

Proposal and Assignment

Service Providers may submit proposals for posted projects. Clients are responsible for reviewing proposals and making final hiring decisions.

Fees and Payments

BEAM may apply a service fee or subscription charge for platform usage, with all transactions processed exclusively through its secure payment system. Prior to entering into an agreement between two companies for a project, an advance payment—proportional to the project’s value—must be deposited with BEAM. This advance serves as a security measure, providing compensation in the event of fraud or contractual breach, thereby safeguarding the interests of both parties.

Communication Policy

All initial project communications must occur within BEAM’s secure messaging system. Sharing personal contact information to bypass BEAM is strictly prohibited. For real-time discussions, the platform provides secure audio/video conferencing features or integrates approved third-party tools for meetings, ensuring all interactions remain traceable and compliant with platform policies.

Intellectual Property

All content, branding, design elements, and underlying technology of the Platform are the exclusive property of BEAM and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws. Businesses and users retain full ownership of the content they upload but grant BEAM a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute such content solely for the purpose of operating, promoting, and improving the Platform and its services. Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of any Platform content is strictly prohibited.

Dispute Resolution

All disputes must first be resolved amicably through direct communication. If unresolved, they will be governed by the laws and exclusive jurisdiction of Your Country/State. BEAM holds no responsibility or liability for disputes or claims between Clients, Service Providers, or companies on the platform. Users acknowledge that policies and agreements may vary by country, but these Terms will be interpreted as per the stated governing law. For cross-border matters, parties may opt for alternative mechanisms such as international arbitration.

Data Privacy & Security

BEAM collects, stores, and processes personal and business data in accordance with its Privacy Policy and applicable laws. The platform implements strict security measures to protect user information. Users are strictly prohibited from attempting to hack, disrupt, exploit, or gain unauthorized access to the platform’s systems or data.

Limitation of Liability

BEAM acts solely as a facilitator and is not a party to any contract or agreement between Clients and Service Providers. The platform bears no responsibility for the performance, quality, delivery, or outcome of any project. BEAM shall not be held liable for any losses, damages, delays, disputes, or claims arising from user interactions, agreements, or transactions conducted through the platform.

Updates to Terms

BEAM reserves the right to amend, update, or modify these Terms at any time, at its sole discretion. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the Platform, unless stated otherwise. Continued use of the Platform after such updates shall constitute your acceptance of the revised Terms. Users are encouraged to review the Terms periodically to stay informed of any changes.

Amendments

For the BEAM platform, we reserve the right to amend these Terms at any time, and continued use signifies your acceptance of such updates. This document, being an electronic record under the Information Technology Act, 2000, requires no physical or digital signatures. Published in accordance with the Intermediary Guidelines Rules, it outlines the rules, privacy policy, and terms governing the use of BEAM’s website, mobile site, and application. The platform, owned and operated by BEAM Technologies Private Limited, provides services subject to these Terms of Use and all incorporated policies.

Contact Information

For questions regarding these Terms, contact:

BEAM

mohan.gummadi@sasi.ac.in

7842279319

); }
